card.name: Aria Citrus Lv1
card.text: [Rest], banish this card: Search your deck for a Lv1 card named "Kiro Centura" and put it into the field. Then shuffle your deck. Play this ability only if you don't control a card named "Kiro Centura".

card.name: Gentry Gold Lv1
card.text: [Rest]: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Genji, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it into an allied graveyard.

card.name: Lilia Chocolate Lv1
card.text: [Rest]: Remove a number of Sweets in an allied graveyard from the game equal to the cost of target enemy servant. If you do, destroy that servant. Play this ability only during an allied main phase.

card.name: Sunny Lv2
card.text: Banish another "Sunny": Target enemy player discards a card. Play this ability only during main timing. [Rest]: Put target servant with a cost of 3 or less from an enemy graveyard into an allied servant zone if that servant was discarded from an enemy hand this turn.

card.name: Tomoe
card.text: [Enter] ⇒ Search your deck for up to four Genji servants not named "Tomoe" and reveal them. Then shuffle the rest of your deck and put the revealed cards on top of your deck in any order.

card.name: Yoshinaka
card.text: [Last Words] ⇒ Put target Genji not named "Yoshinaka" from an allied graveyard into your hand.

card.name: P?tissier
card.text: [Enter] ⇒ Target enemy player discards two cards.

card.name: Gyoza Tiger
card.text: [Last Words] ⇒ Destroy target servant.

card.name: Lapse of Memory
card.text: Target enemy player reveals their hand. Choose a conjure card. They discard that card.

card.name: Swallow Whole
card.text: Destroy target servant. If you do, banish a caster.

card.name: Dealings With Demons
card.text: As an additional cost to play this card, banish an orb. Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Flambe Lv1
card.text: [Rest], banish this card: Search your deck for a Lv1 card named "Stella" and put it into the field. Then shuffle your deck. Play this ability only if you don't control a card named "Stella".

card.name: Vega Scarlet Star Lv1
card.text: [Rest], banish an orb: Corrupt target orb.

card.name: Risa Tarivan Lv1
card.text: [Rest]: Target Genji gains +1000 ATK until end of turn.

card.name: Carella Lv2
card.text: Banish another "Carella": Target allied servant gains +1000 ATK until end of turn. [Rest], discard a caster: Destroy target enemy servant with a cost of 2 or less.

card.name: Sun Wukong
card.text: [Enter] ⇒ Search your deck for a Youkai with a cost of 1, reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Yoshitomo
card.text: [Enter] ⇒ Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put all revealed Genjis from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. (When this card enters the field ⇒ Perform the effect.)

card.name: Yoritomo
card.text: [Enter] ⇒ Search your deck for up to two Genjis with a cost of 1 and put them into the field. Then shuffle your deck. (When this card enters the field ⇒ Perform the effect.)

card.name: High Priest TENGU48
card.text: At end of turn ⇒ Put this card into its owner's hand. [Enter] ⇒ Rest all reversed enemy servants and reverse any non-reversed enemy servants.

card.name: Raging Flame Counterattack
card.text: [Quickcast] (You may play this card any time you have priority.) Destroy target enemy servant attacking you.

card.name: Clothing Combustion
card.text: Turn target face up Lv1 caster face down. If you do, that caster's controller puts the top card of their deck into their caster zone face down and rested, as a caster.

card.name: Passion of Genji
card.text: Banish a Genji: Corrupt target enemy orb. Play this ability only during main timing.

card.name: Solol Baton Lv1
card.text: [Rest]: Target enemy player discards a card if a servant was returned to a player's hand from a servant zone this turn.

card.name: Nadeshiko Lv1
card.text: [Rest]: Produce one aether of any element. Spend this aether only to play Genji and Heishi servants.

card.name: Roseria Bell Lv1
card.text: [Rest], banish this card: Search your deck for a Lv1 card named "Miu" and put it into the field. Then shuffle your deck. Play this ability only if you don't control a card named "Miu".

card.name: Chain of Hearts Lv2
card.text: Banish another "Chain of Hearts": You may pay [2] less to play your next Silva conjure this turn. (The cost can't be reduced lower than 1.) [Rest]: Put a servant with a cost of 3 or less from your hand into the field if an enemy servant was put into its owner's hand from the field this turn.

card.name: Biwa Monk
card.text: [Slow Start] (This card cannot attack the turn it is played to the field.) [Last Words] ⇒ Search your deck for a Heishi not named "Biwa Monk", reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. (When this card is put into a graveyard from the field ⇒ Perform the effect.)

card.name: Bear Boy
card.text: [Slow Start] (This card cannot attack the turn it is played to the field.)

card.name: Benkei
card.text: [Enter] ⇒ Target enemy servant gains -2000 ATK until end of turn.

card.name: Tale of the Heike
card.text: Look at the top five cards of your deck. You may reveal a Heishi from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: Zero Motivation
card.text: [Quickcast] (You may play this card any time you have priority.) Return target servant to its owner's hand. That owner draws a card.

card.name: Just a Short Rest
card.text: [Quickcast] (You may play this card any time you have priority.) Recovered and rested servants you control can't be attacked this turn.

card.name: San Tonal Lv1
card.text: [Rest], banish this card: Search your deck for a Lv1 card named "Luna Esperansa" and put it into the field. Then shuffle your deck. Play this ability only if you don't control a card named "Luna Esperansa."

card.name: Shura Psyche Lv1
card.text: [Rest]: Target Heishi gains +1000 ATK until end of turn.

card.name: Haru Michelle Lv1
card.text: [Rest]: Corrupt target enemy orb if your opponent played a conjure this turn.

card.name: Miu Lv2
card.text: Banish another "Miu": Put all cards in your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order. Then draw that many cards. [Rest]: Destroy target non-Insect servant if an Insect servant you control was destroyed this turn.

card.name: Tadamori
card.text: [Hubris] (Cards with [Hubris] may attack enemy players even if there are reversed enemy servants.)

card.name: Kiyomori
card.text: This card gains [Double Corrupt] and [Hubris] as long as you control another Heishi. (Cards with [Hubris] may attack enemy players even if there are reversed enemy servants.) This card cannot be attacked while rested.

card.name: Vampiress
card.text: Whenever this card corrupts an orb ⇒ Put the top card of your deck into an allied orb zone face down, as an orb.

card.name: Praying to Deaf Ears
card.text: [Quickcast] (You may play this card any time you have priority.) Cancel target ability of a caster.

card.name: Summoning Obstruction
card.text: [Quickcast] (You may play this card any time you have priority.) Return target servant spell to its owner's hand.

card.name: Heishi's Pride
card.text: Heishi you control gain [Hubris] as long as there are more allied Heishi than enemy servants. At the end of your turn ⇒ Banish a servant.

card.name: Merril Laisse Lv1
card.text: [Rest], banish this card: Search your deck for a Lv1 card named "Saira Treverse" and put it into the field. Then shuffle your deck. Play this ability only if you don't control a card named "Saira Treverse".

card.name: Broom Schlein Lv1
card.text: [Rest]: Draw a card if an allied Heishi servant was put into a graveyard from a servant zone this turn.

card.name: Lumielle Lv1
card.text: [Rest]: Swap the ATK and DEF of target enemy servant until end of turn

card.name: Glow Desire Lv2
card.text: Banish another "Glow Desire": Target allied servant gains +500 ATK until end of turn. Draw a card. [Rest]: Target servant with ATK higher than its printed ATK gains +2000 ATK until end of turn.

card.name: Tadanori
card.text: You may pay [1] less to play this card if a Heishi not named "Tadanori" was put into the field this turn. (This cost can't be reduced lower than 1.)

card.name: Usamaru
card.text: [Enter] ⇒ Draw a card.

card.name: Goblin Thief
card.text: Whenever this card is attacked ⇒ That attacking enemy player gains control of this card.

card.name: Pillage
card.text: [Quickcast] (You may play this card any time you have priority.) Until end of turn, if target enemy player would draw a card by a card or ability, you draw a card instead.

card.name: Preparation
card.text: Destroy target servant. If you do, it's owner searches their deck for a card with the same name and puts it into the field. Then that player shuffles their deck.

card.name: Abolition
card.text: Put all servants on the bottom of their owners' decks in any order chosen by their owners.

card.name: Lineal Lv1
card.text: [Rest]: Put target conjure in an enemy graveyard on the bottom of its owner's deck.

card.name: Lady Lupinus Lv1
card.text: [Rest], discard a caster: Put target Heishi in an allied graveyard into your hand.

card.name: Broom Spica Lv1
card.text: [Rest], banish this card: Search your deck for a Lv1 card named "Haru Michelle" and put it into the field. Then shuffle your deck. Play this ability only if you don't control a card named "Haru Michelle".

card.name: Karen Urania Lv2
card.text: Banish another "Karen Urania": Until end of turn, the next time target allied servant would be destroyed by non-battle, it isn't destroyed. [Rest]: Draw two cards and discard a card if an allied servant was destroyed by non-battle this turn.

card.name: Tadamasa
card.text: [Quickcast] (You may play this card any time you have priority.) [Enter] ⇒ Rest or reverse target servant.

card.name: Rocket Pencil Hedgehog
card.text: Whenever this card is targeted by an enemy card or ability ⇒ That enemy player discards a card.

card.name: Iemori
card.text: [Enter] ⇒ Search your deck for a Heishi not named "Iemori", reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Increased Exposure
card.text: Search your deck for a Lv2 caster, reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Knowledge From Ancestors
card.text: Search your deck for a conjure, reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Ambush
card.text: [Quickcast] (You may play this card any time you have priority.) Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a Heishi from among them into the field. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. At the next end of turn ⇒ Destroy the card put into the field by this card.

card.name: Rei Ranpole Lv1
card.text: [Rest], banish this card: Search your deck for a Lv1 card named "Mona Styla" and put it into the field. Then shuffle your deck. Play this ability only if you don't control a card named "Mona Styla".

card.name: Oar Schlein Lv1
card.text: [Rest], banish a Genji: Draw a card.

card.name: Tenel Frula Lv1
card.text: [Rest], discard a caster: Target allied Cosmetics gains [Double Corrupt] until end of turn.

card.name: Citra Cayce Lv2
card.text: [Rest], banish another "Citra Cayce": Search your deck for a Lv1 caster you do not control and put it into the field. Then shuffle your deck. Play this ability only during main timing. [rest], return a Lv1 allied caster to its owner's hand: Up to two target allied Cosmetics gain +1000 ATK until end of turn.

card.name: Masako
card.text: [Enter] ⇒ Rest target reversed enemy servant.

card.name: Sagami Bou TENGU48
card.text: At the beginning of your turn ⇒ Return this card to its owner's hard. [Enter] ⇒ Gain control of target enemy servant as long as this card is in the field. (Even if control of this card changes, you retain control of the targeted card.)

card.name: Soul Bond
card.text: You may pay the Aes aether cost of this card with aether of any element. (Aether of no element still cannot be used.) Choose a soul bond servant from your extra deck and soul bond it. (Choose one of each of the required soul bond material casters from among the allied caster zone, or your hand. If you do, put the revealed soul bond servant into the allied servant zone with the soul bond materials as its stock.)

card.name: Forbidden Love
card.text: As an additional cost to play this card, discard two casters. Search your deck for two Lv1 casters with different names, reveal them and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Partner Change
card.text: Exchange control of target Lv1 face up caster your opponent controls that does not share a name with any card you control, and target Lv1 face up caster you control that does not share a name with any card your opponent controls. (If, during this card's resolution, a target becomes invalid for any reason, the exchange does not occur.)

card.name: Kururu Sentline
card.text: "Twinkle Charm" ♥ "Zoi Russel" [Soul Seal] (This card has "Banish one of this card's stock: Play this card's [Enter]. Play this ability only during main timing.". If this card would leave the field for a non-field zone. Banish one of this card's stock instead.) [Enter] ⇒ Target enemy player banishes a servant.

card.name: Sirius Lucin
card.text: "Deshi Lion" ♥ "Chaleur Suu" [Soul Seal] (This card has "Banish one of this card's stock: Play this card's [Enter] Play this ability only during main timing.". If this card would leave the field for a non-field zone. Banish one of this card's stock instead.) [Enter] ⇒ Destroy target reversed enemy servant.

card.name: Floom Heidi
card.text: "Flame Rouge" ♥ "Chain of Hearts" [Soul Seal] (This card has "Banish one of this card's stock: Play this card's [Enter] Play this ability only during main timing.". If this card would leave the field for a non-field zone. Banish one of this card's stock instead.) [Enter] ⇒ Return target servant to its owner's hand.

card.name: Mipheel
card.text: "Ran Berfield" ♥ "Miu" [Soul Seal] (This card has "Banish one of this card's stock: Play this card's [Enter] Play this ability only during main timing.". If this card would leave the field for a non-field zone. Banish one of this card's stock instead.) [Enter] ⇒ Put target servant in an allied graveyard into your hand. (When this card enters the field ⇒ Perform the effect.)

card.name: Ranniart
card.text: "Sunny" ♥ "Shera Angellica" [Soul Seal] (This card has "Banish one of this card's stock: Play this card's [Enter] Play this ability only during main timing.". If this card would leave the field for a non-field zone. Banish one of this card's stock instead.) [Enter] ⇒ Target enemy player discards a card. Whenever this card corrupts an orb ⇒ Draw a card.

card.name: Lily Lulu
card.text: "Paruetta" ♥ "Eli Superior" [Soul Seal] (This card has "Banish one of this card's stock: Play this card's [Enter] Play this ability only during main timing.". If this card would leave the field for a non-field zone. Banish one of this card's stock instead.) [Enter] ⇒ Look at the top four cards of your deck. You may choose a Flower or Insect from among them and put it into the field. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. [Last Words] ⇒ Banish all allied Flowers and Insects.
